Models.PlayerBehaviorStrategy

  • Uses of PlayerBehaviorStrategy in Models

    Subclasses of PlayerBehaviorStrategy in Models
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AggressivePlayer
    This is the class of Aggressive Player,this player gathers all his armies and attacks from his the strongest territory and maximize his force on one country for winning purpose.
    class 
    BenevolentPlayer
    This is the Benevolent Player class which will focus on defending and will never attack.
    class 
    CheaterPlayer
    Class for Cheater player who cheats by making direct attack on its neighboring enemies during issue order phase and doubles the armies on his countries
    class 
    HumanPlayer
    This is the Human Player class which operates with user orders to make decisions.
    class 
    RandomPlayer
    Class for Random Player who plays random moves by deploying his armies randomly Moves armies in his own territories randomly Attacks random neighboring countries
